verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G746>principles<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>doctrine<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let us go <S%G5342>on<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G5047>perfection;<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

Of the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of <S%G909>baptisms,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for those who were once <S%G5461>enlightened,<s%> <S%G530><s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%>

If <S%G2532>they<s%> shall fall <S%G3895>away,<s%> to <S%G340>renew<s%> them <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3341>repentance;<s%> seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God <S%G388>afresh,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> put him to an open <S%G3856>shame.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> which drinketh <S%G4095>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5205>rain<s%> that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bringeth <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G1008>herbs<s%> <S%G2111>meet<s%> for <S%G1565>them<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> it <S%G2532>is<s%> <S%G1090>dressed,<s%> <S%G3335>receiveth<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> that which <S%G1627>beareth<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5146>briars<s%> is <S%G96>rejected,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is nigh <S%G1451>unto<s%> <S%G2671>cursing;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is to be <S%G1519>burned.<s%> <S%G2740><s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> better <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> we <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> to <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye have <S%G1731>showed<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> in that ye have <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> do <S%G1247>minister.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G1937>desire<s%> that every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> do <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> full <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> the end: <S%G5056><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3576>slothful,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of them who <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promises.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G2316>God<s%> made <S%G1861>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> he <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3187>greater,<s%> he <S%G3660>swore<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2229>Surely<s%> <S%G3375><s%> <S%G2127>blessing<s%> I will <S%G2127>bless<s%> <S%G4571>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiplying<s%> I will <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>so,<s%> after he had patiently <S%G3114>endured,<s%> he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3187>greater:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G3727>oath<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G951>confirmation<s%> is to <S%G846>them<s%> an <S%G4009>end<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G485>strife.<s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1014>willing<s%> more <S%G4054>abundantly<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G276>immutability<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1012>counsel,<s%> <S%G3315>confirmed<s%> it by an oath: <S%G3727><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>immutable<s%> <S%G4229>things,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it was <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie,<s%> we might <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>consolation,<s%> who have fled for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> to lay hold <S%G2902>upon<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> set <S%G4295>before<s%> us:

Which <S%G3739><s%> hope we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G949>steadfast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> which <S%G1525>entereth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that <S%G2082>within<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2665>veil;<s%>

Whither <S%G3699><s%> the <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> is <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G1525>entered,<s%> even <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1519>forever<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>
